questions.question_text: What is the capital of Nepal?
questions.explanation: Kathmandu is the capital and largest city of Nepal.

questions.question_text: Mount Everest is known as ______ in Nepali.
questions.explanation: Sagarmatha (सगरमाथा) is the Nepali name for Mount Everest.

questions.question_text: Who was the first President of Nepal?
questions.explanation: Ram Baran Yadav became the first President of Nepal in 2008.

questions.question_text: In which year did Nepal abolish the monarchy?
questions.explanation: Nepal became a federal democratic republic on May 28, 2008.

questions.question_text: How many provinces are there in Nepal according to the 2015 constitution?
questions.explanation: Nepal has 7 provinces as per the constitution of 2015.
